profile:
RIVERSTONE IRRIGATION LTD is proudly serving the GTA and surrounding areas, we provide affordable and high quality irrigation systems for residential industrial and commercial properties. RIVERSTONE IRRIGATION LTD has been a family owned and operated business for over a decade. Our main objective is our customer service and their satisfaction. We have built a great reputation based on our commitment to provide unmatchable customer service and excellent workmanship, we take great pride in our work and offer professional product selection and warranties.
FULLY INSURED AND WSIB REGISTERED

profile:
***
At Pt Lawn Sprinklers, we know how vital it is to design and install a sprinkler system that will save you time, lower your water bills and keep your lawn looking healthy, lush and green.

Pt Lawn Sprinklers understands how important customer service is for our clients. Our irrigation experts are always available to assist you with any of your issues, needs or requests. Even if you're just looking for some friendly advice, please don't hesitate to give us a call!

Pt Lawn Sprinklers takes pride in our collaborative approach with our clients. We believe in working together with you to nourish your lawn and plant material while being able to conserve water usage.

We specialize in services such as:

***

Spring Start-ups
Mid-Season Check-ups
Fall Winterizing
Modifications to existing systems such as additions and reworking zones
Our service technicians are very experienced and trained to tackle any project of any size.


We know our rates are affordable comparing to our competitors, We stick by our products and pricing by letting you know here so when you try another company you know off hand what our cost is . Here is a list of our prices.


Serving in Toronto, Mississauga, Brampton & GTA. We recommend top quality brand irrigation systems and lawn sprinklers like Rain Bird, Hunter Industries,


Start up is $ 75.00 ( plus a 9 volt battery if required )
Midseason check up is $ 75.00
Repairs hourly rate is $ 75.00 
Winterizing your system does not matter the size or how many zones $75.00

profile:
Ontario Green Irrigation is the company to service your irrigation needs in the GTA and the surrounding areas. Our mission is to beautify residential properties through quality lawn and shrub irrigation.
At Ontario Green Irrigation, we take pride in serving our customers. It's our desire to exceed your expectations in every way. Weâ€™d love to hear from you anytime. Contact us by phone or complete our online form and someone will be in touch with you to answer any questions or hear any suggestions you might have. 
We build irrigation systems that conserve water and automate the process of caring for lawns. Very little needs to be done on the part of our clients to achieve a healthy landscape. We coordinate with the town, take all necessary measurements and arrange for a licensed plumber to complete the hook-up with your plumbing system. Our state of the art equipment allows us to be efficient and available at all times. It also allows us to spend more time getting to know the needs of each particular lawn and customize the system accordingly.  
We are trained and experienced professional irrigation contractors with a history of customer satisfaction in both system installation and service We will select the right Rain Bird products for the unique needs of your landscape, program your controlled to operate at maximum efficiency, and instruct you on how to adjust your system's watering schedule to meet seasonal requirements.
service_area: Brampton, Mississauga, Etobicoke, North York, King City, Nobleton, Gormley, Markham, Vaughan, Toronto, GTA,
products:
We carry full lines of the most popular and good qualtiy sprinkler brands of Rotors, Spray heads, Electric Valves, Controllers, Drip Irrigation, Rain Sensors, etc. As a Rainbird Select Contractor we will install quality irrigation systems with genuine Rain Bird products.
Ontario Green Irrigation proudly uses almost exclusively Hunter and Rainbird Irrigation Products. Hunter and Rainbird products are known as the "Cadillac" of the industry and include a complete lines of sprinklers, rotary heads, shrub heads, valves, controllers (timers) and a variety of accessory products, including rain sensors. Many Hunter and Rainbird products are guaranteed for up to 5 years and can be replaced for labor costs only in the event of failure.
Rotary Sprinkler Rotor-type sprinklers have one or more moving streams of water that rotate around the sprinkler head.
Spray Sprinkler Spray-type sprinklers spray a fan of water out of the nozzle, similar to a shower head.
Valves Electric solenoid valves used for turning on irrigation circuits (sprinklers or drip emitters.) Includes anti-siphon, angle, and globe type valves.
Controllers Controllers are fancy timers used to turn on and off automatic valves.
services:
REPAIR ALL BRANDS OF LAWN SPRINKLERS QUICKLY AND PROPERLY.
Our service techs are experienced and well-trained, and our service trucks are equipped with the latest troubleshooting equipment which allows us to quickly diagnose, troubleshoot, and properly repair all brands of sprinkler systems.
RE-ROUTING A SPRINKLER SYSTEM during swimming pool construction is no problem for Fellows Irrigation. We will cap off existing irrigation to permit usage of lawn sprinklers in areas not affected by construction, then re-route sprinklers around pool as needed to maintain a beautiful backyard.
INSTALL NEW LAWN SPRINKLERS SYSTEM - Ontario Green Irrigation will custom-design and install your system to give the most efficient, cost effective lawn sprinkler possible. Zone landscape areas to water according to watering needs. Landscape areas in full shade (between houses, for example) need less water than full sun areas. Proper zoning of your system will cost more to install but save you money in the future as well as save our most precious resource - water!
QUALITY PRODUCTS COMBINED WITH SKILLED SERVICE TECHS is what Ontario Green Irrigation is about and what will make you a satisfied customer.
brands: As a Rainbird Select Contractor we will install quality irrigation systems with genuine Rain Bird products.
specialities:
Our technicians are trained to check and repair any sprinkler system problem effectively! We try our best to satisfy our customers by providing them with quality service; that's why they stay with us!
